name: Underground Chemistry
description:
A game about a chemist in the basement.

Controls:

  • Arrows for walking
  • "E" for interaction
  • "LMB" for moving things between slots
  • "Tab" to change the selected slot for interactions.

INSTRUCTIONS FOR THE GAME:

  1. Buy materials  near the stairs.
  2. Dry mamasia
  3. Grind mamasia
  4. Put on the craft table: shredded mamasia and paper.
  5. Sell what you did on the table.
